content: Cristoforo Colombo una volta andò in un McDonald's e ordinò un Happy Meal. Non lo rese felice, però gli piacque il gioco.
translations: eng:Christopher Columbus once walked into a McDonald's and ordered a Happy Meal. It did not make him happy, but he liked the
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
